dict.string: The Queen is displayed with how you have eliminated her beloved pet bats. She is determined to stop you from shooting anymore.
The Queen will appear periodically and momentarily use gravity fields to destabilize your crosshair. Try to avoid her or else shooting bats will become much more difficult.
Beware of the Queen's meddling ways...
Your sniper crosshair is equipped with nightvision capability. As soon as you place your crosshair over the bat, it will be illuminated.
Queen Wuzuh Tyan has released a swarm of stealth bats. You must stop them from multiplying before they get out of control.
Prepare to go into the darkness....
